comments: O. Brand in Bot. Jahrb. Syst., 62: 489-490 (1929) is a misprint for A. Brand according to G. Zijlstra.
examples: Syrmatium biolettii (Greene) A. Brand in Bot. Jahrb. Syst., 25: 225 (1898).
source: Barnhart, Biogr. Notes upon Botanists. Notice of death in Verh. Bot. Vereins Prov. Brandenburg, 73: 1 (1931).
